name: la-tour-webapps
description: Webapps for LA Tour of Heroes

scripts.build: rm -rf build/* && npm run build:mh && npm run build:stb && mv src/movistar-home/build/ build/movistar-home && mv src/set-top-box-haac/build/ build/set-top-box-haac
scripts.build:mock: rm -rf build/* && npm run build:mh:mock && npm run build:stb:mock&& mv src/movistar-home/build/ build/movistar-home && mv src/set-top-box-haac/build/ build/set-top-box-haac
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:mh; npm run cleanup:stb
scripts.install: npm run install:mh && npm run install:stb
scripts.device:mh: echo "Error: no implemented yet -> adb install <apk-file> && adb shell am start -n <webview-activity> -e <url-to-open>" && exit 1

author: Telef√≥nica
